parameters.name: handleErrors
parameters.label: Evaluate all states as errors (except for 2xx and 3xx )

expect.name: shareCookies
expect.label: Share cookies with other HTTP modules

expect.name: rejectUnauthorized
expect.label: Reject connections that are using unverified (self-signed) certificates

expect.name: useQuerystring
expect.label: Disable serialization of multiple same query string keys as arrays

nested.help: The text to display on the quick reply button.
nested.name: title
nested.label: Title

nested.help: Custom data that will be sent back to you via the `messaging_postbacks` webhook event.
nested.name: payload
nested.label: Payload

nested.help: Required if `Title` is an `emptystring`. URL of image to display on the quick reply button for text quick replies. Image should be a minimum of 24px x 24px. Larger images will be automatically cropped and resized.
nested.name: image_url
nested.label: Image URL
